trans-unit.source: Supply Planning | Microsoft Docs
Prepare a detailed executable plan and the final-assembly production schedule for sales and production demand.
trans-unit.target: Pøipravte podrobnı realizovatelnı plán a harmonogram vıroby po dokonèení montáe pro prodej a poptávku po vırobì.

trans-unit.source: Planning
The production operations required to transform inputs into finished goods must be planned daily or weekly depending on the volume and nature of the products.
trans-unit.target: Vırobní operace potøebné k pøemìnì vstupù na hotové zboí musí bıt plánovány dennì nebo tıdnì v závislosti na objemu a povaze produktù.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] offers features to supply for anticipated and actual demand from sale, assembly, and production as well as features for distribution planning using stockkeeping units and location transfers.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]nabízí funkce, které poskytují oèekávané a skuteèné poadavky z prodeje, montáe a vıroby, stejnì jako funkce pro plánování distribuce pomocí skladovıch jednotek a transferù lokací.

trans-unit.source: This topic mainly describes planning for companies involved in manufacturing or assembly management where the resulting supply orders can be either production, assembly, transfer, or purchase orders.
trans-unit.target: Toto téma popisuje zejména plánování spoleèností zapojenıch do øízení vıroby nebo montáe, kde vısledné objednávky dodávek mohou bıt buï vırobní, montání, pøevodní nebo nákupní objednávky.

trans-unit.source: The main interface for this planning work is the **Planning Worksheet** window.
trans-unit.target: Hlavním rozhraním pro tuto plánovací práci je okno **Sešity plánování**.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] also supports supply planning for wholesale companies where the resulting supply orders can only be transfer and purchase orders.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]také podporuje plánování dodávek pro velkoobchody, kde vısledné objednávky dodávek mohou bıt pouze Transfer a nákupní objednávky.

trans-unit.source: The main interface for this planning work is the **Requisition Worksheet** window, which is described indirectly in this topic as most planning functionality applies to both worksheets.
trans-unit.target: Hlavním rozhraním pro tuto práci s plánováním je okno **Sešit poadavkù** , které je nepøímo popsáno v tomto tématu, protoe vìtšina funkcí plánování platí pro oba listy.

trans-unit.source: Before you can plan and execute production orders, you must configure production capacities, such as creating shop calendars, routings, production BOMs, and machine centers.
trans-unit.target: Døíve ne mùete plánovat a provádìt vırobní zakázky, musíte konfigurovat vırobní kapacity, jako jsou napøíklad vytváøení kalendáøù dílny, technologické postupy, vırobní kusovníky a strojní centra.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Setting Up Manufacturing](production-configure-production-processes.md).
Planning can be seen as the preparation required supply orders in the assembly or manufacturing departments to fulfill demand.
trans-unit.target: Plánování lze povaovat za pøípravu poadovanıch objednávek dodávek v sestavení nebo vırobních oblastech k uspokojení poptávky.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Assembly Management](assembly-assemble-items.md) and [Manufacturing](production-manage-manufacturing.md).
trans-unit.target: Pro více informací navštivte [Správa vıroby](assembly-assemble-items.md) a [Vıroba](production-manage-manufacturing.md).

trans-unit.source: The following table describes a sequence of tasks, with links to the topics that describe them.
trans-unit.target: Následující tabulka popisuje sekvenci úloh s odkazy na témata, které je popisují.

trans-unit.source: **See**
Get a brief introduction to how the planning system can be used to detect and prioritize demand and suggest a balanced supply plan.
trans-unit.target: Struènı úvod do zpùsobu, jakım lze plánovací systém pouít ke zjišování a stanovení priorit poptávky a k návrhu vyrovnaného plánu dodávek.

trans-unit.source: [About Planning Functionality](production-about-planning-functionality.md)
Understand how all aspects of the planning system works and how to adjust the algorithms to meet planning requirements in different environments.

trans-unit.source: [Design Details: Supply Planning](design-details-supply-planning.md)
Learn how the planning logic differentiates between demand at locations according to the SKU setup and demand without location codes.

trans-unit.source: [Planning With or Without Locations](production-planning-with-without-locations.md)
Forecast production demand presented by expected sales and production orders.

trans-unit.source: [Create a Production Forecast](production-how-to-create-a-forecast.md)
Create one-to-one production orders automatically from a sales order to cover the exact demand of that sales order line.

trans-unit.source: [Create Production Orders from Sales Orders](production-how-to-create-production-orders-from-sales-orders.md)
Create a project production order directly from a multiline sales order representing a production project.

trans-unit.source: [Plan Project Orders](production-how-to-plan-project-orders.md)
Use the **Order Planning** window to manually plan for sales or production demand one production BOM level at a time.

trans-unit.source: [Plan for New Demand Order by Order](production-how-to-plan-for-new-demand.md)
Use the **Planning Worksheet** window to run both the MPS and MRP options to automatically create either a high-level or detailed supply plan at all item levels.
trans-unit.target: Okno **Sešity plánování** pouijte ke spuštìní moností MPS i MRP k automatickému vytvoøení plánu dodávky na vysoké úrovni nebo podrobnı plán dodávek na všech úrovních poloek.

trans-unit.source: [Run Full Planning, MPS or MRP](production-how-to-run-mps-and-mrp.md)
Run the requisition worksheet to automatically create a detailed supply plan to cover demand for items that are replenished by purchase or transfer only.

trans-unit.source: **Requisition Worksheet** page
Initiate or update a production order as rough-scheduled operations in the master production schedule.
trans-unit.target: Zahájení nebo aktualizace vırobní zakázky jako hrubì naplánované operace v hlavním plánu vıroby

trans-unit.source: [Replan or Refresh Production Orders Directly](production-how-to-replan-refresh-production-orders.md)
Recalculate work or machine center calendars due to planning changes.

trans-unit.source: "To calculate a work center calendar" section in [Set Up Shop Calendars](production-how-to-create-work-center-calendars.md)
Track the order demand (tracked quantity), forecast, blanket sales order, or planning parameter (untracked quantity) that has given rise to the planning line in question.

trans-unit.source: [Track Relations Between Demand and Supply](production-how-track-demand-supply.md)
View an item's projected available inventory by different views and see which gross requirements, planned order receipts, and other events influence it over time.

trans-unit.source: [View the Availability of Items](inventory-how-availability-overview.md)
